Mike Pence , on the House floor in January 2011, said, This legislation does not cut one penny from Title X family planning funding. I applaud much of the important work that is done at Title X clinics across this country- breast cancer screening, HIV protection, education, counseling, pregnancy diagnosis. This legislation simply prevents family planning funding from aiding organizations that profit from the abortion industry.
